item.description: Join us this month for the Holiday Extravaganza! Shop over 50 vendor tables and mix and mingle with 300 attendees! Enjoy scrumptious appetizers, cheese display and pasta bar. How about trying a Dareatini cocktail or possibly win one of the more than 50 raffle prizes! And since this is the season for giving try your luck in the special raffle to benefit the foster children of DARE Family Services. Tickets are available by contacting me directly or help out a vendor and purchase one directly from them! (If they sell 10 tickets they are entered into a special drawing for a phenomenal prize!) See you there!

group.name: Dare To Be Phenomenal's Success Minded Women's Network

item.name: DARE To Be Phenomenal's Holiday Extravaganza
